title: Market Research Minute: Latest Insights & News | Similarweb
description: Keep up to date on the world of Market Research from Similarweb, including the latest news, blogs, videos, and events. Get this month's update.
content: HomeBlogResearchMarket ResearchSimilarweb Market Research Minute - July 2022 Research Intelligence Similarweb Market Research Minute – July 2022 Talk to a specialist by Emily Hunt , Market Research & eCommerce Specialist 1 Min. July 4, 2022 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Welcome to your Market Research Minute – your quick news update. +642% ROI?! What could be better? Forrester Consulting just released a study on how one Similarweb client boosted ROI by 642% over three years and decreased CPC by 15% using Digital Research Intelligence. Read the report→ Win with gaming benchmarks With visits growing 17.2% YoY and 6.5% QoQ in Q1, more than in recent quarters, the online gaming industry’s on a winning streak. Check out the big movers and the metrics you need to achieve to win. Get the latest benchmarks → Lucky 7: market research examples Want A++ outcomes? Replicate the market research processes of these top seven companies from around the globe. Learn more → Forget FOMO: event coverage Digital 100: top takeaways Even if you missed the leading event for digital decision-makers, you can still get the strategies to up your growth game. Read on → Marketing strategy teardown Ready to gain 360° visibility and charge ahead in any market? We’ve got you covered in our webinar with Mention. Watch the replay → That’s it for now – see you next month, next minute. Enjoy 360 Visibility 24/7 Adapt to market changes and industry trends instantly with Similarweb Digital Research Intelligence. Book a live demo by Emily Hunt Market Research & eCommerce Specialist Emily writes about digital retail, CPG, travel, and consumer finance, with a background in business development and marketing.
